comments: [A501] Pentonville Road (All directions) at the junction of Claremont Square - Temporary traffic signals in place due to Cadent Gas works.

Gallows Corner Flyover Refurbishment - [A12] Eastern Avenue East (All directions) at the junction of [A12] Colchester Road - Various restrictions, to facilitate the refurbishment of Gallows Corner Flyover. Full closure of the Flyover and the roundabout including all approaches in place.
[A1205] Burdett Road (Both directions) at the junction of [A13] East India Dock Road - Lane restrictions in place to facilitate Thames Water works.

[A23] Streatham Hill (Both directions) between [A205] Christchurch Road and Leigham Court Road - Various restrictions for TfL works. Lane restrictions, in place over the course of the works. On 15/02/2026, 16/02/2026, 17/05/2026, 18/05/2026 there will be a full overnight closure.
King William Street (Southbound) at the junction of Lombard Street - Road closed to facilitate urban realm works.
[A400] Hampstead Road (Both directions) at the junction of Robert Street - Lane restrictions and closure of Varndell Street in place for HS2 works.
[A3203] Lambeth Bridge (Eastbound) between [A3036] A 3036 and [A3212] Millbank - Lane restrictions are in place at either side of the bridge for junction improvement works.

Rotherhithe Tunnel Closed  - [A101] Rotherhithe Tunnel (Both directions) at the junction of [B205] Rotherhithe Street - When there is congestion inside the Rotherhithe Tunnel, the Tunnel may be subject to short intermittent closures.
[A1010] High Street (Both directions) at the junction of Clarence Road - Multi-way temporary signals in operation due to borough roadworks.

[A11] Mile End Road (Eastbound) at the junction of [A1205] Burdett Road - Lane restrictions in place to facilitate Thames Water works. Additionally, Burdett Road is reduced to one lane in both directions.
[A3031] Albert Bridge Road (Both directions) at the junction of [A3212] Chelsea Embankment - The bridge is closed for local borough works.
[A105] Green Lanes (All directions) at the junction of Broomfield Lane - Four-way temporary traffic signals are in use to facilitate repairs by Cadent Gas.
[A2213] Kidbrooke Park Road (Northbound) at the junction of Weigall Road - Temporary traffic signals in use to facilitate emergency SGN works. Weigall Road is also closed.

[A24] Tooting High Street (Both directions) at the junction of Trevelyan Road - Contraflow in place at this location as part of Thames Water (new connection) major scheme works. These works are taking place at multiple locations along the A24 in Tooting and Balham, with various restrictions in place.

[A24] Balham High Road (Both directions) at the junction of Balham Park Road - Two-way temporary traffic signals in operation at this location as part of Thames Water (new connection) major scheme works. These works are taking place at multiple locations along the A24 in Tooting and Balham, with various restrictions in place.

Cadent Gas works - [A3216] Queenstown Road (Southbound) at the junction of [A3205] Battersea Park Road - Southbound closure between Prince of Wales Drive and Battersea Park Road to facilitate Cadent Gas works.
[A501] Marylebone Road (Both directions) between Cosway Street and Balcombe Street - Various restrictions, including lane closures and side road closures, during Cycleway works.
[A40] Westway (Eastbound) at the junction of [A3220] West Cross Route - The exit slip road to the Northern Roundabout is closed to facilitate repair works.
[A41] Finchley Road (Southbound) at the junction of Arkwright Road - Lanes one and two of three are closed due to Thames Water works.
[A400] Hampstead Road (Both directions) at the junction of Prince Of Wales Passage - Temporary traffic signals in place to facilitate UKPN works.
[A400] Hampstead Road (Northbound) at the junction of [A501] Euston Road - There is a contraflow system in operation with temporary traffic signals to facilitate utility works.
[A302] Bressenden Place (Southbound) at the junction of [A302] Victoria Street - Lane closures are in place to facilitate works to the pavement.
[A1205] Burdett Road (Both directions) at the junction of [B140] St Pauls Way - Temporary traffic signals and lane restrictions in use to facilitate Thames Water works.
[A107] Upper Clapton Road (Northbound) between [A107] A 107 and Brooke Road - Bus Lane closure due to works.
[A215] Walworth Road (Both directions) at the junction of Heygate Street - Lane restrictions in place to facilitate Thames Water Works.
[A4020] Uxbridge Road (Eastbound) at the junction of [A4127] Greenford Road - Lane restriction in place to facilitate works.
[A11] Bow Road (Westbound) at the junction of Kitcat Terrace - Lane one (of one) is closed due to Thames Water works.
[A219] Wood Lane (Both directions) at the junction of [A40] Westway - Various carriageway and footway restrictions in place to facilitate Cycle Superhighway works.
[A206] Woolwich Church Street (Both directions) at the junction of [A206] Woolwich Ferry Roundabout - Various restrictions in place to facilitate cycle lane works.
[A4] Pall Mall (Eastbound) between [A4] Haymarket and [A4] Waterloo Place - Road closed to facilitate utility works.
[A308] Fulham Road (All directions) at the junction of [A3220] Gunter Grove - Four-way temporary traffic signals in place due to Thames Water works.
[A124] Barking Road (Both directions) at the junction of Liddon Road - Temporary traffic signals in place for Thames Water works.
[A206] Woolwich Road (Both directions) between Anchor & Hope Lane and John Wilson Street. - Lane restrictions to facilitate the construction of a segregated cycle lane.
[A501] Pentonville Road (Eastbound) between Cynthia Street and Rodney Street - Lane one (of two) closure to be implemented to facilitate Cadent Gas works.
[A2] New Cross Road (Westbound) at the junction of Pepys Road - Lane restrictions are in place to facilitate a gas main replacement.
[A210] Eltham Road (Westbound) at the junction of Eltham Green Road - Traffic management and westbound bus lane closure to facilitate SGN gas works.
[A205] Brownhill Road (Westbound) at the junction of Laleham Road - Lane restrictions in place to facilitate works by SGN.

[A205] Waldram Park Road (Westbound) at the junction of Westbourne Drive - Nearside carriageway restrictions to facilitate essential Thames Water repair works to a burst main. Traffic Management will remain in place 24/7 until repaired.
[A21] Rushey Green (Southbound) at the junction of Davenport Road - Lane closure to facilitate SGN Footway & Carriageway works.

[A21] Rushey Green (Southbound) at the junction of Rosenthal Road - Bus Lane restriction in place due to SGN gas main replacement works. Also buses are not able to use Rosenthal Road due to further restrictions.
[A2216] Lordship Lane (Both directions) at the junction of [A205] Dulwich Common - The pavement is partially conned off following earlier tree pruning.
[A3] Battersea Rise (Both directions) at the junction of Chivalry Road - Temporary traffic signals in operation to facilitate works.
[A21] Kentish Way (Northbound) at the junction of Stockwell Close - There is a northbound lane 2 restriction for utility works.
[A214] Tooting Bec Gardens (Eastbound) at the junction of Fernwood Avenue - Eastbound Carriageway incursion for Thames Water works.
[A23] Brixton Road (Southbound) at the junction of Beehive Place - Lane one (of two) is closed due to electrical works.
[A23] Purley Way (Southbound) at the junction of [A232] Croydon Road - Lane one (of two) is closed to facilitate UKPN works.
[A24] Balham High Road (Southbound) at the junction of Marius Road - The footpath and cycle lane are partially blocked to facilitate nightly telecommunication works.
[A3205] Battersea Park Road (Both directions) at the junction of Culvert Road - Two way temporary traffic signals have been implemented to facilitate emergency Cadent Gas works.
[A3205] Nine Elms Lane (Both directions) at the junction of Ponton Road - Lane closures in place to facilitate Urban Realm Works.
Hook Rise South (Westbound) between Ashcroft Road and Oakcroft Road - Lane one is closed to facilitate repairs to gas leak.
[A3205] Nine Elms Lane (Westbound) at the junction of [A3036] Wandsworth Road - Westbound lane closure to be implemented to facilitate Cadent Gas works.

Burlington Lane (Both directions) at the junction of [A316] Great Chertsey Road - Burlington Road is closed in both directions with restrictions in place on Great Chertsey Road due to junction improvement work.
[A3220] Warwick Road (Northbound) at the junction of Nevern Square - Lane one (of three) closed to facilitate carriageway frame and  cover repair work.
[A4] Great West Road (Westbound)  Prior to Gresham Road - Lane closure to facilitate utility works.

[A40] Western Avenue (Westbound) at the junction of Alliance Road - The traffic signals have failed following an earlier collision. As a result, the eastbound filter lane, for traffic making U-turns, has been closed for safety reasons.
[A406] Edgware Road (Northbound) at the junction of Oxgate Lane - Lane restriction are in place to facilitate Cadent Gas works.
[A41] Park Road (Southbound) at the junction of Grove Gardens - Southbound lane one (of two) closure to be implemented to facilitate Cadent Gas works.
[A1] Watford Way (Northbound) at the junction of [B1461] Daws Lane - Lane one of three is closed to facilitate maintenance works.
[A41] Finchley Road (Northbound) at the junction of [B510] Fortune Green Road - Lane restrictions northbound for Thames Water works.
[A10] Bishopsgate (Southbound) between Threadneedle Street and Cornhill - Overnight road closure for resurfacing works.
[A5] Edgware Road (Northbound) between Connaught Street and Kendal Street - Lane one (of two) closed to facilitate urgent water leak repair work.
[A501] City Road (Both directions) at the junction of [A501] Finsbury Square - Temporary traffic signals in use to facilitate resurfacing works.
[A4000] Wales Farm Road (Southbound) at the junction of Jenner Avenue - Bus lane closure to facilitate electrical replacement works.
Du Cane Road (Both directions) at the junction of Hilary Road - Two-way temporary traffic signals are in operation for bridge works.
[A4020] Uxbridge Road (All directions) at the junction of Broadway - Temporary lights in place to facilitate emergency gas works.
[A40] Newgate Street (Westbound) at the junction of Old Bailey - The road is closed westbound and temporary traffic signals for emergency gas works.
[A206] Woolwich Church Street (Westbound) at the junction of Warspite Road - Lane restriction due to ongoing cycle scheme works.

[A2043] Kingston Road (Both directions) at the junction of King Henrys Road - Two and three way temporary traffic signals to be implemented to facilitate cycle lane construction carried out by Royal Borough of Kingston.
[A212] Whitehorse Road (Southbound) between [A213] Windmill Road and Devonshire Road - The southbound carriageway is closed for utility works.
[A3212] Whitehall (Northbound) at the junction of Horse Guards Avenue - The road is closed between Parliament Square to Trafalgar Square to facilitate emergency gas works.
The Green (Both directions) at the junction of [A3005] Merrick Road - Lane closure in place with temporary traffic signals for Borough works.
[A4020] Broadway (Both directions) at the junction of Leeland Terrace - Temporary traffic signals in operation for Thames Water sewer upgrade works.
[A222] Chislehurst Road (Southbound) at the junction of Frognal Avenue - A lane closure is in place to facilitate Thames Water works to a water main.
[A235] Brighton Road (Southbound) at the junction of Upland Road - Lane restrictions are in place to facilitate UKPN works.
